Text:
Both iLife 11 and iWork 9 were already here, more than a dozens times over, and with hundreds of active seeders. So this upload was totally worthless and just increases the clutter on this site -- especially since you're not bothering to seed it. And not posting your name while assuring everyone it's "virus-free" is very fishy, too.

So, in a nutshell: Stay away, everyone. Nothing worthwhile here. If you need the files, just do a search like the OP didn't bother to do. It takes, oh, five seconds.
